Hello World from section: %1$d
how_to
Hello!
Let\'s have some introduction first. Do you know how to mix colors? Have a try with basic colors. For example, mix red and yellow to get orange.
Mix red and blue to get purple.
"For green mix yellow and blue."
"Your goal is to paint outer sides of crosses, so addition of these colors will result central color."
Tap outer squares to change their color.
You are right!
"LEVEL 0"
AWESOME
DO YOU REALLY WANT TO QUIT?
DO YOU REALLY WANT TO GO BACK TO MAIN MENU?
Try to solve this one colouring as few squares as possible. If you forget how to mix specific color, long press it and hint will appear ;)
Well played! I think you are ready to begin...
Swipe right to continue...
I am happy to introduce you brown
Say hello to pink, cyan and light yellow
Welcome to the bright side. Here are light orange, light purple and light green
